group.name: multigrid
group.description: Dynamically display multiple grids in Surfer or GeoTIFF format as layers on maps. Also add 'mapmultigrid' to 'plugins' and to 'map.customLayers' and define and register grid profiles for activating the layers.

parameter.name: profiles
parameter.description: Name(s) of 'mapmultigrid' profiles to be considered. Separate multiple names by comma.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: Render mode of the mapmultigrid plugin. May be overridden per grid profile.

group.name: profiles
group.description: Define one grid profile per grid file to show on maps. Add the name of the profile to 'map.mapmultigrid.profiles' for using them.

parameter.name: watch
parameter.description:
List of filenames to be monitored for changes with inotify. Supported file formats are: Surfer 6 (binary grids) and GeoTIFF. The GeoTIFF support is experimental and not all GeoTIFF datatypes are supported. The file extension must be TIFF for GeoTIFF files. Separate multiple files by comma.
The corresponding directory must exist prior to opening maps.

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: The title of the legend.

parameter.name: legendArea
parameter.description: Sets the location of grid legend.

parameter.name: legendVisible
parameter.description: Show the legend for this profile.

parameter.name: discrete
parameter.description: Use a discrete gradient is for rendering in grid mode.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: Render mode of the grid profile.

parameter.name: visible
parameter.description: Make this item visible at startup.

parameter.name: composition
parameter.values: src-over, dst-over, clear, src, dst, src-in, dst-in, src-out, dst-out, src-atop, dst-atop, xor, plus, muliply, screen, darken,lighten, color-dodge, color-burn, hard-light,soft-light, difference, exclusion, src-or-dst,src-and-dst, src-xor-dst, not-src-and-not-dst,not-src-or-not-dst, not-src-xor-dst, not-src,not-src-and-dst, src-and-not-dst
parameter.description:
Sets the composition mode. Specifies how the pixels of the grid (the source) are merged with the pixels of the map (the destination).
See the QT documentation: https://doc.qt.io/archives/qt-4.8/qpainter.html#CompositionMode-enum for the modes.

parameter.name: renderBackToFront
parameter.description: If true, render polygons in inverse value order, highest value first and lowest value last.

parameter.name: stops
parameter.description:
Gradient used for rendering the grid. Overridden by configuration of gradients parameters.
Example (value:color:style):
30.00:ff00fa:"major",60.00:f25ffb:"minor"
where minor and major refer to the name of style profiles which must be defined.

parameter.name: style
parameter.description: Name of defined style profile(s) to be considered. Can be omitted if styles are named in 'stops'.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the standard built-in gradient. Read the documentation of color gradients for the details.

parameter.name: min
parameter.description: Minimum value of the target value range.

parameter.name: max
parameter.description: Maximum value of the target value range.

parameter.name: alpha
parameter.description: Transparency. Overrides the alpha value of the gradient.

parameter.name: nodes
parameter.description:
Number of nodes at which to define the color gradient. The respective values will be shown in legends.
< 2: Use nodes originally defined by gradient.

group.name: styles
group.description: Define style profiles used by the grid profiles.

group.name: brush
group.description: Brushes are used to fill a polygon. They have two attributes: color and pattern.

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: The brush color following the color definition in SeisComP: color-code name, rgb or hexadecimal representation.

parameter.name: pattern
parameter.description: The brush pattern.

group.name: pen
group.description: Pens are used to draw lines with three attributes: color, style and width.

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: The pen color following the color definition in SeisComP: color-code name, rgb or hexadecimal representation.

parameter.name: style
parameter.values: nopen, solidline, dotline, dashline, dashdotline, dashdotdotline
parameter.description: The pen style.

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: The pen width.
